topic.title: How to Change/Reset the Table Numbering

indexterm.product: author developer editor authorEclipse developerEclipse editorEclipse

body.p: There are cases when you need to change the aspect of the table counter that is shown before the table titles. By default, the table titles are formatted like this:Table NN. Lore Ipsum Title
NN is the number of the table that starts being counted from the beginning of the publication.

One use-case is to have the NN counter be incremented only within one chapter (for example, the first chapter contains "Table 1" and "Table 2", and the second chapter starts over with "Table 1" instead of incrementing to "Table 3").

body.p: For the DITA Map PDF - based on HTML5 & CSS transformation scenario type, you should reset the table counter on each chapter, then hide the label from the table caption (this is an HTML element generated by the XSL transformation), and create another label using a :before selector on the caption.
